targetLine.movie: Back to the Future Part III

contextBefore.text: How could you forget a thing like your hat? Would you like some water?

contextAfter.text: I'll tell you what I'll do, Mr. Eastwood. I'll help you find your blacksmith friend. You can stay the night in the barn. And tomorrow, I'll take ya as far as the railroad tracks...you can follow 'em straight on in into town. I'll even give you a hat.
Ahh. Woogie William. Woogie William. Ohh, yes. I think you'll find the barn comfortable. I've never had any complaints about it from the pigs.

movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-ii: Back to the Future Part II
movieTitles.back-to-the-future-part-iii: Back to the Future Part III
